comment: I love this whiskey! Nice smoke and sweetest combine.
Strong campfire forward, slight damp/tobacco notes, char finish, long lasting flavor. Lingers a lot.

Meh… Aroma isn’t bad, just boring and comes through like slightly spicy clay; Palate is a touch fruity but mostly young and woody; Finish is the best part and seems to pull out more mature and complex notes than the rest.
Butterscotch notes.  Slightly rough on the finish.
Butterscotch nose, not much smoke, sweet and savory mouth, short finish.
